briefTitle: Closed Loop Vagal Nerve Stimulation for Patients With Posttraumatic Stress Disorder
officialTitle: Closed Loop Vagal Nerve Stimulation in Patients With Posttraumatic Stress Disorder
summary: The tasks of the project are to map the potency and kinetics of the neurologic, autonomic peripheral, inflammatory, and behavioral responses to vagal nerve stimulation (VNS) vs. sham treatment, at baseline and in response to stressful traumatic scripts related to personal traumatic events, as well as a series of other stressors.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline, Post Stress Testing (Up to 4 Hours)
